title: Missing token
body:
Hi Riot
I recently just finished my match in hexakill and it said that I got an S for Nami. HOWEVER, the token did not pop up. 

Please Help

replies.body: You can't receive mastery tokens in featured game modes, you can only earn mastery up to M5 in RGM.

Oh thanks for telling me that.
It's kinda shit but thanks for letting me know
